meanings.definition: Not controlled or supervised by rules or regulations.
meanings.sent1: The unregulated market allowed businesses to operate freely.
meanings.sent2: The unregulated industry grew rapidly without any oversight.
meanings.sent3: The unregulated playground was chaotic but fun for the kids.
meanings.sent4: Her unregulated creativity knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The unregulated forest was a wild and untamed place.

meanings.definition: Not subject to restrictions or limitations.
meanings.sent1: The unregulated party went on all night without any interruptions.
meanings.sent2: The unregulated flow of ideas led to innovative solutions.
meanings.sent3: The unregulated laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: His unregulated enthusiasm was contagious to everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The unregulated imagination of the artist produced stunning works of art.
